Koffing (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0108: Lickitung
Pokémon
#0110: Weezing →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Koffing (TCG Pocket).

Koffing has been featured on 27 different cards since it debuted in the Base Set of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Koffing cards are normally Darkness-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Koffing

Koffing
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
